title: Exhibition Ground / Open Exhibition Ground / Exhibition Centre - All activities related to various exhibitions and ancillary structures like office, restaurant etc
clause_text: Exhibition Ground / Open Exhibition Ground / Exhibition Centre - All activities related to various exhibitions and ancillary structures like office, restaurant etc. of built- up area not exceeding 10% of the total area.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
